description.name: Combination Spanner Bent Type 14mm
description.long_desc:
Combination Wrenches are used for loosening and tightening nuts and bolts.


Product Features



  • Open end angled 15-degree to flip and re-engage in tight spaces

  • 12-point box end deep offset by 70° for better access to recessed nuts

  • Chrome vanadium steel forging for durability

  • Satin finish provides anti-corrosion protection and slip resistant grip


Technical Data



  • Spanner Type: Combination Spanner

  • Size System: Metric

  • Size: 14 mm

  • Material: Chrome Vanadium Steel

  • Finish: Chrome Satin

description.name: Double Ended Ring Spanner Set 8pcs (6x7-20x22mm)
description.long_desc:
Ring Box-End Wrenches with different sized ends on the same wrench.


Product Features



  • 12-point deep 70-degree offset metric box-end

  • Set includes 8-piece Ring Spanners: 6x7, 8x9, 10x11, 12x13, 14x15, 16x17, 18x19, 20x22 mm

  • Chrome vanadium steel forging for durability

  • Oval body for a more comfortable grip

  • Polished chrome surface for maximum corrosion protection

  • Roll-up Pouch included


Technical Data



  • Spanner Type: Ring Spanner

  • Size System: Metric

  • Size Range: 6 - 22 mm

  • Material: Chrome Vanadium Steel

  • Finish: Chrome Satin

  • Number of Pieces: 8
